attributes.action: Bring back the use of pistols for all legal FAC holders.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is not just target shooters who wish to train for the olympics that want the use of pistols back.Shooters from all over the country want their sport and pastime returned.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Bring back the use of pistols for all legal FAC holders."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page14636.asp

Prime Minister's Office
